mapper.sql: a.id as id, a.open_id as openid, a.petname as petName, a.email as email, col.cname as college, a.photo_path as photoPath
LEFT JOIN college col ON col.id = a.college_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user( id, college_id, email, petname, photo_path, open_id, register_time, update_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{college}, #{email}, #{petName}, #{photoPath}, #{openid}, NOW(), NOW() )
